metadata.Title: CVE-2021-35331 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - negligible.
metadata.Description: ** DISPUTED ** In Tcl 8.6.11, a format string vulnerability in nmakehlp.c might allow code execution via a crafted file. NOTE: multiple third parties dispute the significance of this finding.

notes.Note: sbeattie> issue is disputed (see github tcl commit) because the format string vuln is in a build helper.

criterions.comment: tcl8.6 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
